step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the first step! You performed the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion well. Remember to breathe deeply, inhaling as you pull your shoulders back.
In step 2, focus on maintaining a smoother, more controlled circular motion.  Try to keep your elbows relaxed and avoid any jerky movements.
Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Concentrate on completing the full four repetitions with consistent, controlled movements.  Try to keep your wrists relaxed.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the shoulder rolls exercise!  Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled throughout all four repetitions.  Focus on deep breathing to enhance the exercise's benefits.
